name: Adventure Game (itch) (Snowy Fox)
description:
STEP 4: MAKE A GAME IN A WEEK

A short little choose-your-own-adventure style game made in Godot in one week. Can you find a way to escape from the wizard's castle?

This was hard. I made this game mainly to practice building menu systems, and I feel like I learned a lot. However, it took so much longer to put those systems together than I thought it would, that I wound up having only one day to build the adventure itself. I really wish I'd saved this for the "make a game in two weeks" step.

This game took about thirty-two hours in total to make. It and all of its art and audio assets were made by me.
